Plot: Tells the story of the complex relationship between an Israeli Secret Service officer and his teenage Palestinian informant. Shuttling back and forth between conflicting points of view, the...
Title: Bethlehem
Actors: Tsahi Halevi, Shadi Mar'i, Hitham Omari, Michal Shtamler
tomatoConsensus: Balancing complex Middle Eastern politics against a universal human drama, director Yuval Adler fashions Bethlehem into a thought-provoking, well-acted character study.
